评论详情: Great shirt to help us intellects inform others where the REAL academians go to learn in Charleston.. CofC is the “real” college! And I’m definitely proud to be a College of Knowledge Cougar, Class of ‘91.

Amazing to find this on Amazon. Grew up in Charleston and went to the C of C. Have lived away for years and always tell people that it was called the college of knowledge, which was a lovable joke. Great to have the shirt. Bought in pink. Looks just like pic. Size is perfect. Soft cotton. Happy purchase!
